snippet: The company earned $80 million in the latest quarter, compared with $732 million in the same period a year earlier.
abstract: Archer Daniels Midland reports sharply lower quarterly earnings and cuts its capital spending plans; posts fiscal second-quarter earnings of $80 million, or 12 cents a share, compared with $732 million, or $1.14 a share, in the period a year earlier.
lead_paragraph: The company earned $80 million in the latest quarter, compared with $732 million in the same period a year earlier.

headline.seo: Profit at Archer Daniels Falls Sharply
headline.main: Profit at Archer Daniels Falls Sharply
headline.print_headline: A Volatile Commodity Market Hurts Profit at Archer Daniels
